skills.name: Blade Salvo
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 15s] Deploys the cross (summoned entity) to launch Sakura katanas at enemies in a large area, slashing them once every 0.3s for 3.5s. Each slash deals Fire DMG equal to 5*25.0% ATK, Ignites targets to further deal 200.0 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 10s, and inflicts 1 Sakura Count (CD: 2s).

skills.name: Blazing Sakura
skills.description:
Hitting a target triggers a Sakura Slash covering a cicurlar area surrounding the target, dealing Fire DMG equal to 150.0% ATK.
Enemies with Sakura Brand or Sakura Count take another 2,700 Fire DMG from Sakura Slash. Sakura Slash CD: 5s.Sakuno Rondo equip bonus: Sakura Slash adds 2 Sakura Counts and restores 14.0 SP.

skills.name: Beyond Pledge
skills.description: Active triggers Sakura Rain that makes enemies in a large area take 40.0% more Fire DMG for 12s.

skills.name: Key of Binding
skills.description: In co-op raids, team deals 20.0% bonus Lightning DMG and takes 15.0% less Fire DMG for 10.0s after a weapon skill is used.
